name: Forest (itch) (Progz, Korotsu, Valentine Collino)
description:
You are in a forest. Everything seems good, until night comes.
Be careful of the totem... It will come for you!

This project is not a game, just a proof of concept.
You can only move around and have fun with the transition and the beautiful features of the project.
Have fun :)

Controls : 
Movements : zqsd (made for azerty support)
Mouse : Camera
Enter : Start the transition
P : Pause the transition
I : Change between night and day
O : Reset the transition
